item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: Research
item.description: Publications Peer reviewed Populist positions in party competition: Do parties strategically vary their degree of populism in reaction to vote and office loss? Party Politics, 2022, Online First (Open Access). DOI: 10.1177/13540688221097082 Replication files DOI:10.7910/DVN/1F861L Other Voter reactions to trajectories of women`s representation (single-authored). URPP Equality of Opportunity Discussion Paper Series, No. 14, 2023, URL Narratives of backlash? Perceptions of changing status hierarchies in open-ended survey responses (with Tabea Palmtag and Delia Zollinger).

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Seminars Undergraduate Seminar Gender and the Radical Right, Fall 2020 and Spring 2022, University of Zurich Syllabus Tutorials Tutorial Methods of Political Science (Fall 2013/2014, Spring 2017, Fall 2017/2018 & 2018/2019), Freie Universität Berlin & University of Freiburg Tutorial Data Analysis (Spring 2017 & 2018), Freie Universität Berlin
